title: SosSpagetti
author: SosSpagetti
content: We are looking for a team of 6-8 people who can write in Chinese or Korean. The task is to advertise the project in social media. Work hours are 4-6 hours a day. For more details, please write a DM here or on Telegram @maxmeriss.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: We have 中文 (Chinese) and 한국어 (Korean) local boards. The members who are not good at English or afraid of English they usually spend their time on the local boards. Hopefully you will find the right guys from there.Cheers,
